english.segment1: Take me as I am. I'm lost and I'm confused. Lord what should I do. Meet me where I am. Healer I need you. To do what you do
english.segment2: Cause' it's just like me. To be broken before I see. And it's just like you. To turn this old man into new
english.segment3: Comforter provider. Protector and friend. Here I am again. Asking for your mighty hand. To lead me once again lead me once again
english.segment4: Cause' it's just like me. To be broken before I see. And it's just like you. To turn this old man into new
english.segment5: I want to be just like. I want to be just like. I want to be just like you
english.segment6: I want to be just like. I want to be just like. I want to be just like you
english.segment7: Cause' it's just like me. To be broken before I see. And it's just like you. To turn this old man into new
english.segment8: I want to be just like. I want to be just like. I want to be just like you
english.segment9: And I want to walk. Walk by your side. Walk by your side. Walk by your side
english.segment10: Cause it's just like me. And it's just like you.
